column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////It had been a long while since I'd dined at Bavette's
column3: but my return to it last night made me remember why it is my favorite restaurant in town. The ambiance
column5: and the impeccable service from Michael the bartender
column6: allowed me & a long time friend to have one of the best nights ever. I didn't anticipate the bonus of fantastic conversation
column9: and a surprise sparkling dessert that ended a perfect evening - and yet Michael delivered all of these things as he smiled behind his bow tie. Well done
column10: Sir! Well done! I love this place.
